title: National Public Transport Access Nodes (NaPTAN) - Ferry Ports

queries.query: select * from naptan_ferry_ports order by ST_Distance(LatLong, ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint($2, $1), 4326));
queries.description: Find ferry ports closest to a lat/lon point
queries.name: nearest

queries.query: select * from naptan_ferry_ports where LatLong && ST_MakeEnvelope($2, $1, $4, $3, 4326);
queries.description: Find ferry ports within a region
queries.name: extent

queries.query: with ferry_ports as (select *, ST_DISTANCE((select latlong from codepoint where postcode = normalise_postcode($1)), latlong) distance from naptan_ferry_ports) select * from ferry_ports where distance < (1000 * $2) order by distance asc;
queries.description: Find ferry ports near to a postcode (distance in kilometers)
queries.name: postcode
